questions.clue: This common household adhesive, known for its fast-setting properties, is often used for quick repairs.
This natural adhesive, derived from animal collagen, was historically used by woodworkers and is sensitive to humidity.
This synthetic polymer adhesive, used in the construction industry, is known for its weather-resistant properties.
In adhesive chemistry, this term refers to the process by which a glue hardens and bonds after application.
This term describes the ability of an adhesive to maintain performance under varying temperature and humidity conditions.
This weather phenomenon involves visible electrical discharges during a storm and is often accompanied by thunder.
Common in the Great Plains of the United States, this rotating column of air is often referred to as a 'twister' and can cause significant damage.
This phenomenon occurs when a large amount of sand or dust is carried by strong winds, reducing visibility, and is common in desert regions.
This seasonal wind pattern brings heavy rainfall to South Asia and is crucial for agriculture in the region.
This rare weather event occurs when cold weather causes rain to freeze upon contact, encasing everything in a layer of ice.

For $400: A stormy night at the moors sets the scene for the ghostly appearances of this character, Catherine Earnshaw, in Emily Brontë's novel.

For $1000: This character from Herman Melville's 'Moby-Dick' is obsessed with hunting a white whale regardless of the turbulent seas.
This innovation has revolutionized urban commuting by providing a shared, eco-friendly alternative to cars, especially popular in cities with unpredictable weather.
Developed in Japan, this type of train utilizes magnetic levitation to reduce friction and increase speed, unaffected by weather conditions.
This type of drone, often used for package delivery, can adjust its flight path based on real-time weather data.
These vehicles, often used in agriculture and construction, have tracks instead of wheels to provide better traction in muddy or snowy weather.
This technology, integrating AI and smart sensors, allows cars to adjust their driving patterns based on real-time weather and road conditions.
This festival, known for throwing colored powders, marks the arrival of spring in India.
In Spain, this festival involves running with bulls through the streets of Pamplona.
During this Swedish festival, people dance around a maypole to celebrate the summer solstice.
Known as the world's largest beer festival, this event takes place annually in Munich, Germany.
In Japan, people gather to watch cherry blossoms bloom during this traditional custom.

final.clue: This adhesive substance, often used in schools, shares its name with a meteorological phenomenon involving small water droplets suspended in air.
